titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Peripheral Arterial Disease Awareness Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 7/28/2006--Introduced. Expresses support for: (1) the goals and ideals of National Peripheral Arterial Disease Awareness Week; and (2) raising awareness of the consequences of undiagnosed and untreated peripheral arterial disease and the need to seek appropriate care as a serious public health issue. Acknowledges the critical importance of peripheral arterial disease awareness to improve national cardiovascular health.
